Simon & Simon (1981)
S01E05 The Least Dangerous Game
First aired: 12/29/1981
 
Rick and A.J. are hired to investigate the death of an animal keeper. They go undercover at the zoo after finding drugs in the dead man&#039;s apartment. They soon become very suspicious of their client, a wealthy benefactor, especially after learning of his connection to one of the zoo&#039;s major benefactors, the Kenner foundation. With the help of the zoo veterinarian, Rick and A.J. investigate both the drugs found at Hal&#039;s apartment and Frye himself, who fires the brothers when he thinks they&#039;re getting too close.
